metadata.title: CVE-2016-6186 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in thedismissChangeRelatedObjectPopup function incontrib/admin/static/admin/js/admin/RelatedObjectLookups.js in Djangobefore 1.8.14, 1.9.x before 1.9.8, and 1.10.x before 1.10rc1 allows remoteattackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via vectors involvingunsafe usage of Element.innerHTML.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-6186` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

python-django - 1.8.7-1ubuntu5.1
python-django-common - 1.8.7-1ubuntu5.1
python3-django - 1.8.7-1ubuntu5.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: python-django package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.8.7-1ubuntu5.1').
